name: 汉匈决战/Han Xiongnu Wars
description: Welcome to Han Xiongnu Wars. A stand-along game and synergy of historical Far East and multiple features in role-playing, real-time strategy and action gameplay. This game brings you to the eventful years of the early Han Dynasty, and faithfully presents the ancient eastern culture with many objects and scenes faithfully reconstructed...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or greater Processor: Intel Core Duo 2.0 GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 3600+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card with 256MB RAM Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Standard audio
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64bit or greater Processor: Intel Core i5-3450, FX-8120, or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 650M, hd 6750, or better Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Standard audio
